title: Java Intern
description:
About Hema AI
 
 Hema AI is an AI\\-focused technology company building intelligent, scalable software products. We leverage modern engineering practices and robust backend systems to support high\\-performance, AI\\-driven applications.
 



  




 Role Overview
 
 We are seeking a Java Intern to assist in the development, testing, and maintenance of backend systems and services. The intern will work with experienced engineers to build reliable, scalable, and secure Java\\-based applications.
 



  




 Key Responsibilities
 * Develop and maintain backend services using Java
* Assist in designing and implementing RESTful APIs
* Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following best practices
* Participate in debugging, testing, and performance optimization
* Work with databases and backend integrations
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional engineering teams
* Contribute to code reviews and technical documentation



  




 Required Qualifications
 * Strong fundamentals in Java and object\\-oriented programming
* Understanding of data structures and basic algorithms
* Familiarity with backend development concepts
* Basic knowledge of REST APIs and HTTP protocols
* Experience with Git or other version control tools



  




 Preferred Qualifications
 * Exposure to Spring Boot or similar Java frameworks
* Basic knowledge of SQL and relational databases
* Understanding of microservices architecture
* Academic projects, internships, or hands\\-on backend development experience



  




 What We Offer
 * Paid internship with real\\-world backend engineering exposure
* Fully remote work environment
* Mentorship from experienced backend and platform engineers
* Opportunity to work on production\\-grade systems
* Potential for full\\-time employment based on performance



  




 Application Process
 
 Interested candidates may apply by sending their resume and relevant project details or GitHub profile to:
 **info@tryhema.com**

title: Software  Developer
description:
**About Company** 
 :
 



  





 They balance innovation with an open, friendly culture and the backing of a long\\-established parent company, known for its ethical reputation. We guide customers from what‚Äôs now to what‚Äôs next by unlocking the value of their data and applications to solve their digital challenges, achieving outcomes that benefit both business and society.
 



  





**About Client:** 




  





 Our client is a global digital solutions and technology consulting company headquartered in Mumbai, India. The company generates annual revenue of over $4\\.29 billion (‚Çπ35,517 crore), reflecting a 4\\.4% year\\-over\\-year growth in USD terms. It has a workforce of around 86,000 professionals operating in more than 40 countries and serves a global client base of over 700 organizations.
 



 Our client operates across several major industry sectors, including Banking, Financial Services \\& Insurance (BFSI), Technology, Media \\& Telecommunications (TMT), Healthcare \\& Life Sciences, and Manufacturing \\& Consumer. In the past year, the company achieved a net profit of $553\\.4 million (‚Çπ4,584\\.6 crore), marking a 1\\.4% increase from the previous year. It also recorded a strong order inflow of $5\\.6 billion, up 15\\.7% year\\-over\\-year, highlighting growing demand across its service lines.
 



 Key focus areas include Digital Transformation, Enterprise AI, Data \\& Analytics, and Product Engineering‚Äîreflecting its strategic commitment to driving innovation and value for clients across industries.
 



  





**JD** 




  





**Exp\\-6\\+Yrs** 




  





**Location\\- Pune/Hyderabad** 




  





**Role Summary** 




  





 The role supports HSBC‚Äôs Group Data Management Technologies team, focusing on Collibra (Group Data Dictionary) to enable enterprise\\-wide data governance, quality, and lineage. The role involves workflow development, system support, and automation using Java/Groovy and Collibra APIs.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop and support Collibra workflows, integrations, and configurations
* Design BPMN workflows using Eclipse IDE, Java, Groovy, and REST APIs
* Troubleshoot Collibra data, system, and performance issues
* Translate Product Owner requirements into scalable technical solutions
* Ensure compliance with data governance standards, policies, and regulations
* Automate support tasks and optimize existing code
* Promote standardized data definitions and best practices



**Required Skills \\& Qualifications** 



* Bachelor‚Äôs degree or equivalent
* Hands\\-on experience with Collibra workflow development and administration
* Strong Java and Groovy scripting with REST API knowledge
* Experience with BPMN workflows and Git/GitHub
* Knowledge of cloud platforms (GCP preferred)
* Strong understanding of data management and data quality practices
* Excellent communication, analytical, and stakeholder management skills

 **Finacle Tester**

 **Loans, Payments, and Trade Finance** 
 modules. The role involves validating end\\-to\\-end banking workflows, configurations, integrations, and compliance with business rules to ensure high\\-quality delivery of core banking solutions.

**Finacle Loans (Retail Lending):** 



* Validate
 **Admin Module configurations** 
 , system parameters, and setup.
* Test

* Perform

 .
* Validate

 , business rules, and exception handling.

 ,

 , or similar.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams for timely resolution of issues.

**Required Skills:** 



* 1‚Äì8 years of experience in

 (Loan Origination/Payments/ Trade Finance)

 **workflows** 
 .
* Hands\\-on experience with
 **BPM/BRMS** 
 testing.
* Good knowledge of

 for data validation.

title: Machine Design Engineer
description:
**About Anzo Controls Pvt. Ltd.**

  





 With the vision to make India a global robotics and automation hub, Anzo Controls Pvt. Ltd. has been designing and manufacturing indigenous automation solutions since its inception. Within the first three months, we successfully developed our first
 **SCARA Robot** 
 , followed by
 **AGVs/AMRs, Delta Robots, Gantry Systems, Palletizers, Case Packers (Racer Track), Case Erectors, Case Makers, Box Lifters, Pallet Lifters, Turntables, ASRS, and complete conveying solutions** 
 .
 



  





 We strongly believe in the
 **‚ÄúMake in India, Build for India‚Äù** 
 philosophy. All our products are proudly
 **Made in India** 
 , with a strong emphasis on quality, innovation, and core engineering values.
 



 With a team of
 **100\\+ professionals** 
 across manufacturing, projects, design, applications, software, controls, and sales, Anzo Controls is rapidly expanding its footprint. To strengthen our engineering team, we are looking for passionate and skilled
 **Mechanical Design Engineer.** 




  




**Key Roles and Responsibilities:**

  




* Design and develop mechanical systems and assemblies for
 **automation and material handling solutions** 
 such as conveyors, robotics, ASRS, palletizers, gantry systems, AGVs/AMRs, etc.
* Prepare
 **2D drawings and 3D models** 
 using SolidWorks and AutoCAD.
* Create detailed
 **manufacturing drawings, BOMs, and assembly drawings** 
 .
* Work closely with application, controls, electrical, manufacturing, and project teams.
* Support new product development and customization based on customer requirements.
* Perform design calculations, material selection, and tolerance analysis.
* Ensure designs meet
 **functional, safety, quality, and cost requirements** 
 .
* Provide engineering support during manufacturing, assembly, testing, and installation.
* Participate in design reviews and continuous improvement activities.
* Maintain proper documentation and revision control as per company standards.
* Coordinate with vendors and suppliers for technical clarifications when required.



  




**Key Skills, Experience, and Qualifications:**
* Minimum
 **1\\+ year of experience** 
 in mechanical design, preferably in
 **automation, robotics, or material handling industry** 
 .
* Strong hands\\-on experience in
 **SolidWorks and AutoCAD** 
 (mandatory).
* Good understanding of
 **mechanical components, fabrication processes, and assembly methods** 
 .
* Knowledge of conveyors, robotics systems, structures, sheet metal, machined parts is preferred.
* Ability to interpret customer requirements and convert them into practical designs.
* Basic knowledge of GD\\&T, welding standards, fasteners, and materials.
* Experience working with
 **cross\\-functional teams** 
 .
* Good problem\\-solving, analytical, and communication skills.
* Self\\-driven, proactive, and eager to learn new technologies.
* Willingness to visit shop floor and project sites when required.
* **Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Mechanical Engineering** 
 or related technical qualification is preferred (experience is valued at Anzo Controls).

 √úber uns ‚Äì the i\\-engineers AG mit Sitz in der Schweiz und Deutschland blickt auf 20 Jahre Erfahrung in der Entwickelung und Einf√ºhrung von Softwareprodukten f√ºr den Gesundheitssektor zur√ºck.  Wir sind familienfreundlich, Home\\-Office und Teilzeitarbeit sind bei uns selbstverst√§ndlich. Wir bieten 5 Wochen Ferien im Jahr, und unsere Sozialleistungen sind √ºberdurchschnittlich. Weiterbildung? Klar, wir unterst√ºtzen den Fortbildungswillen unserer Mitarbeitenden. Zudem setzen wir auf Nachhaltigkeit und fahren lieber Zug als Auto.
   

  

 Wenn Du Neugierde, Einsatzbereitschaft und Offenheit mitbringst und gerne die kreative L√∂sungssuche f√∂rderst, bist Du bei uns richtig.

The role focuses on IT Service Management (ITSM) and Customer Service Management (CSM) modules and requires strong hands\\-on development, scripting, and integration experience.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

 Development \\& Configuration
   

 Customize and configure ServiceNow ITSM and CSM modules, including Incident, Problem, Change, Service Catalog, and Case Management.
   

 Develop and maintain workflows, Flow Designer flows, and automation scripts.
   

 Create and manage UI Policies, Client Scripts, Business Rules, Script Includes, and custom applications.
   

 Implement ServiceNow best practices for scalable and maintainable solutions.
   

 Integration
   

 Build and support integrations using REST/SOAP APIs, MID Server, and Integration Hub.
   

 Ensure secure, reliable, and scalable integrations with external systems such as CRM and ERP platforms.
   

 Troubleshoot and optimize integration performance.
   

 Platform Administration
   

 Support instance upgrades, cloning, patching, and overall platform performance optimization.
   

 Configure and manage CMDB, Discovery, and Asset Management.
   

 Assist in maintaining platform stability and availability.
   

 Quality \\& Compliance
   

 Adhere to ServiceNow coding standards and development best practices.
   

 Ensure alignment with ITIL processes, security standards, and compliance guidelines.
   

 Participate in code reviews and continuous improvement initiatives.
   

  

 Required Skills \\& Qualifications
   

 Experience
   

 4‚Äì10 years of hands\\-on ServiceNow development experience.
   

 Strong exposure to ITSM and CSM implementations.
   

 Technical Skills
   

 Proficiency in JavaScript, Glide API, HTML, CSS, Jelly, and AngularJS.
   

 Strong hands\\-on experience with ServiceNow scripting and configurations.
   

 Experience with Flow Designer, Integration Hub, and Orchestration.
   

 Good understanding of ServiceNow data model and platform architecture.
   

 Certifications
   

 ServiceNow Certified System Administrator (CSA) ‚Äì Mandatory
   

 Certified Implementation Specialist ‚Äì ITSM / CSM ‚Äì Preferred
   

 Certified Application Developer (CAD) ‚Äì Good to have
   

 Behavioral / Soft Skills
   

 Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.
   

 Ability to work effectively in Agile/Scrum environments.
   

 Strong problem\\-solving and analytical mindset.
   

  

 Why Join Element Technologies
   

 Opportunity to work on large\\-scale ServiceNow implementations
   

 Exposure to enterprise and global clients
   

 Flexible engagement models (FTE / C2C)
   

 Strong focus on technology excellence and growth
